content.rendered:
Hebei Airlines  is a Chinese airline which has its corporate headquarters in the Shijiazhuang World Trade Plaza Hotel   in Chang’an District, Shijiazhuang, Hebei Province. The airline was formerly known as Northeast Airlines (China); it re-branded itself as Hebei Airlines in 2010.

 

Hebei Airlines in China Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: World Trade Plaza No. 303 Zhongshan East Road Chang’an District, Shijiazhuang, China, 05001

Phone: +86 311 96 699
24-hour ticket hotline: 0311-96699

Fax: NA

Working hours: NA

Email: NA

Hebei Airlines Official website: https://www.hbhk.com.cn/

Hebei Airlines Online Check-in: www.hbhk.com.cn/online-check-in

Note: Online check-in is available 24 hours before your scheduled departure of your Hebei Airlines flights.

Check Hebei Airlines flight status here: www.hbhk.com.cn/flightStatus

Hebei Airlines Baggage

View Hebei Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Hebei Airlines

Total fleet: 28

  • Boeing 737-800
  • Comac C919
  • Embraer ERJ-190

Queries handled by Hebei Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Hebei Eagle Club

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Hebei Airlines in China Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Hebei Airlines in China: (click on the stars below)
